content:
Process Instantiation and Enactment

  • Performing the modeled process using a process engine to guide/enforce as planned

  • A process enforcement policy variable allows progressive relaxation of process enactment constraints (e.g., relax process step or product pre-conditions).

  • Relaxation increases likelihood of process breakdowns.

  • Beyond the scope of DES and SD packages
